description: Module that allows you to send a goodbye message to old members.

channel.description: Set the channel where the farewell messages will be sent.

arguments.name: channel
arguments.description: Channel where farewell messages will be sent.

type.description: Set the way in which the farewell message will be sent.

type.name: type
type.description: Way in which the welcome farewell will be sent.

docs.description: Get the link of the farewells module documentation.

view.description: View the settings of the farewells module.

reset.description: Restores the module settings to the original ones (data can't be recovered).

confirmation.name: confirmation
confirmation.description: Are you really sure you want to reset the data for this module?
